entry.title: 0.8.6 release candidate 1
entry.summary: A release candidate 1 of version 0.8.6 of the Bitcoin software is now available for testing. The software can be downloaded from the project's page on SourceForge, and users are encouraged to give it a try, particularly those running OSX or Windows. This announcement was made by Gavin Andresen, one of the lead developers of Bitcoin.
